name: BSIPA
description: A mod loader for Beat Saber. Provides a number of useful tools and utilities.

name: BeatSaverDownloader
description: Enables you to download songs from BeatSaver in-game.

name: CameraPlus
description: CameraPlus is a Beat Saber mod that allows for multiple wide FOV cameras with smoothed movement, which makes for a much more pleasant overall spectator experience. See More Info below for details.

name: BeatSaverSharp
description: A .NET library to interact with the BeatSaver API.

name: BS Utils
description: A basic library for mods to use for common functionality.

name: SongCore
description: A plugin for handling custom songs in Beat Saber.

name: BeatSaberMarkupLanguage
description: An XML based UI system.

name: BeatSaverVoting
description: A plugin for up/downvoting songs on BeatSaver

name: ScoreSaberSharp
description: Official C# Library to interact with the ScoreSaber API

name: Note Cut Minimizer
description: Tweaks the note debris to make it way less obtrusive on maps with lots of notes. Also makes debris fall in the direction you hit the note.

name: Custom Notes
description: Adds support for custom notes in beat saber. Major contributions by Kyle1413, Pespiri, Auros, and PixelBoom.

name: Custom Campaigns
description: Adds the ability to load custom campaigns into the game. Includes a special campaign to celebrate the 1 year anniversary of the Beat Saber Modding Group.

name: CustomCampaignLeaderboardLibrary
description: A library required for custom campaign leaderboards.

name: SongDataCore
description: Download and cache database dumps of ScoreSaber and BeatSaver. Map the information by song hash and make available to other plugins.

name: MappingExtensions
description: This adds some additional things you can do with your maps as a mapper, and allows you to play said maps as a player. View More Info for details.

name: Ini Parser
description: A .NET, Mono and Unity3d compatible(*) library for reading/writing INI data from IO streams, file streams, and strings written in C#. Not made by myself, refer to github link for author.

name: ChromaLite
description: A slimmed down version of Chroma that only handles maps that utilize Chroma events, such as Chroma's famous RGB lighting events.

name: JustRainbowLights
description: The name says it all

name: PauseMenuRotationFix
description: Fixes wrong controller orientation when pausing in 90/360 levels.

name: NoFailCheck
description: Ever get tired of starting a song with No Fail on, and getting annoyed, let this mod annoy you instead to remind you!

name: YUR Fit Calorie Tracker
description: Track YUR calories while playing Beat Saber!

name: TransparentWall
description: Enable transparent walls in VR, or disable them in LIV.

name: PerfectionDisplay
description: Adds more info to the results screen and during gameplay if enabled. Will use HitScoreVisualizer config if you have the plugin and integration is enabled.

name: Perfection Display
description: Adds more info to the results screen and during gameplay if enabled. Will use HitScoreVisualizer config if you have the plugin and integration is enabled.

name: PracticePlugin
description: Plugin for Beat Saber to adjust song parameters, seek through songs and set up looping sections.

name: HTTP Status
description: Create stream overlays or track your performance using third party programs. This plugin exposes live information about the current game status allowing other programs to visualize it in unique ways.

name: Enhanced Stream Chat
description: Enhanced Stream Chat is a rich text chat integration mod, with full unicode, emote, and emoji support.

name: Stream Core
description: Stream Core is an IPA based mod designed to allow developers to create interactive chat experiences with ease.

name: Song Request Manager
description: Song Request Manager is an integrated, fully Customizable song request bot and Console for BeatSaber. This is an Alpha release for the 1.16.1. Added CPU automtt support

name: TheTrashMan
description: Allows you to reduce and potentially eliminate stuttering by tuning the garbage collector.

name: AdaptiveSFXRemover
description: Removes the adaptive volume adjustments of sound effects.

name: FireworksDisabler
description: Are you tired of hearing those annoying fireworks at the end of a song with a new high score? Installing this mod will disable Fireworks, no options to set, it just does it.

name: SaberTailor
description: Tweak things about your sabers, including grip position/angle, trail appearance and saber length/width. Created by Ruu. Additional contributions by Pespiri.

name: NoteSpawnEffectRemover
description: Removes the note spawn effect (the bright light cone) of notes and bombs.

name: Custom Exit
description: Displays a panel to confirm that you really really want to exit Beat Saber.

name: BeatSaberCustomExit
description: This is a mod that displays a panel to confirm that you really really want to exit Beat Saber.

name: SongBrowser
description: Adds various sorting and filtering methods to the UI. Search, favorites, ranked, and unranked filters. Sort by BeatSaver and ScoreSaber statistics. Adds PP and other extra stats to the stat panel.

name: Counters+
description: A suite of enhancements for Beat Saber's UI

name: BS-RefreshButtons
description: Adds refresh buttons in the mods panel in game, to refresh your custom songs.

name: Level Pack Panel Mover
description: Moves the bottom panel (containing the level packs) of the Beat Saber main menu further down (or wherever you want). No more accidental missclicks while scrolling down the song list.

name: ScoreSaber
description: Allows you to upload scores to an online leaderboard at https://scoresaber.com. Earn PP from ranked maps and compare scores with others.

name: CustomMenuText
description: Tired of playing BEAT SABER? Would you rather play BEAT SAMER, YEET SABER, BEAT MYMEAT, or anything else? With this plugin, you can change the game's title in the main menu!

name: Random Sabers
description: This mod enables selection of a random saber from the current downloaded pool of sabers, as well as selecting specific sabers for which to enable/disable selection.

name: Custom Avatars
description: Allows the use of custom player avatars for in-game body presence.

name: Custom Sabers
description: A plugin for custom Beat Sabers.

name: DarthMaul
description: Adds Darth Maul mode as well as other related features to Beat Saber.

name: EndlessMode
description: Stitches songs together so that your entire playlist plays before you return to the menu

name: HitScoreVisualizer
description: Visualizes the scores of your hits! Overly complex config options! Numbers? All the pros use it, except the ones who don't. (But they should.)

name: CustomMissText
description:
(Made by Arti)
Broke: "MISS"
Woke: "HITN"T"
----
Random text whenever you miss a block!

name: CustomMissText
description: Random messages whenever you miss a note. Because apparently people like those.

name: Custom Platforms
description: A plugin to support custom platforms and environments

name: Particle Overdrive
description: Enable/disable camera noise, and global particle haze, configure note slash/explosion and saber clash particle amount. Created by lolPants with additional contributions by Steven ğŸ€ and Zingabopp.

name: AutoPause
description: Will pause your game if it detects a tracking error or an fps drop.

name: BeatSaberMultiplayer
description: Allows you to play with friends online!

name: Versus
description: Track your scores and watch as you beat your friends, or challenge your favorite streamer! Make playlists and chase down your friend's scores. Link your Twitch at versusmod.com to enable Challenges

name: EnhancedSearchAndFilters
description: A mod that helps you quickly find the songs you want to play! Includes an auto-refreshing search screen and song filtering.

name: Enhanced Search And Filters
description: A mod that helps you quickly find the songs you want to play! Includes an auto-refreshing search screen, song filtering, and other basic UI additions.

name: YamlDotNet
description: YamlDotNet is a .NET library for YAML

name: LibConf
description: .NET framework configuration library that's somehow cooler than the rest

name: Nett
description: .Net library for TOML

name: Music Spatializer
description: Makes the audio 3D when wearing headphones. Also in 360 maps the music will follow the notes.

name: Particular
description: Make Beat Saber prettier with P A R T I C L E S
newdescription: ä½¿ç”¨P A R T I C L E Sä½¿Beat Saberæ›´åŠ æ¼‚äº®

name: Drink Water
description: Displays a panel to remind you to drink some water after playing for a long time/amount of songs!

name: BeatSaberDrinkWater
description: Displays a panel to remind you to drink some water after playing for a long time/amount of songs!

name: BSIPA Mod List
description: An ingame mod viewer and update manager for BSIPA.

name: RandomSongPlayer
description: Downloads a completely random map from BeatSaver and plays it immediately

name: NoArrowsRandom
description: Restores the randomized No Arrows mode from previous versions for custom maps as a game modifier. Disables score submission and won't affect One Saber or mapped No Arrows modes.

name: BeatSpearSupport
description: Beat Spear changes Standard and No Arrows modes into One Color, to support playing with a spear like or two handed sword weapon. Disables scoring submission and will not affect One Saber modes.

name: libSkiaSharp
description: SkiaSharp is a cross-platform 2D graphics API for .NET platforms based on Google's Skia Graphics Library. It provides a 2D API that can be used across mobile/server/desktop models to render images.

name: SkiaSharp
description: This is a c# wrapper for the c++ libSkiaSharp library. More info in the libSkiaSharp description.

name: StepBackWall
description: Adds the option to re-enable the glorious "Step Back" walls

name: Song Refresh Button
description: Adds various refresh buttons in game.

name: CustomUI
description: This mod allows for Beat Saber mod developers to implement custom settings user interfaces in a simple and easy way. This mod does nothing on its own!

name: Scoreboard Stylist
description: A plugin for managing styling on beat saber leaderboards

name: Nova's Fuckery
description: A collection of the random shit I come up with.

name: BSML
description: An XML based UI system.

name: BSMOTD Plus
description: Learn more about what's happening in the community! When you launch your game you're prompted with news posts from the community.

name: AlphaTwitch
description: Adds new features and utilities for Twitch streamers in Beat Saber

name: Enhancements
description: Adds various extra features into Beat Saber like a clock and volume adjustment!

name: Custom Colors
description: Allows you to customize your colors in Beat Saber

name: GameplayModifiersPlus
description: Adds additional modifiers to the game, see More Info for details

name: GameplayRestrictionsPlus
description: Adds various Restrictions you can add to your game, from fail on Imperfect Cut to Crash or Restart on Miss! see UserData/GamePlayRestrictionsPlus.ini for Configuration

name: Harmony
description: A library for patching, replacing and decorating .NET and Mono methods during runtime.

name: Deviation Counter
description: A counter to show how early/late you hit bloq.

name: Intro Skip
description: Allows you to skip intros and outros of songs that are longer than 5 seconds without any significant objects.

name: CustomFailText
description: Like that one mod, but for the other thing.

name: osusaber
description: Click the circles!

name: BeatSaberTweaks
description: Plugin for Beat Saber containing Various Tweaks.

name: FPS Counter
description: A Beat Saber mod to show your fps in-game.

name: LeaderboardInSong
description: Provides an in song leaderboard comparing your score as you play to the scores on the active leaderboard page as of starting the song

name: SongLoader
description: A plugin for adding custom songs into Beat Saber.

name: Discord Presence
description: Add a discord richpresence integration to the game to share your current playtime and active modifiers

name: FCDisplay
description:
Display a ring around the multiplier if you haven't missed yet.

Comes with multiple miss animations and the option to disable the vanilla display (the lines above and below the combo counter)

name: TwitchPlus
description: Adds various Twitch-related functions to Beat Saber. Read the mod info readme.

name: Custom Menu Music
description: A mod that adds custom music to your menu! Uses either your CustomSongs library or music of your choosing.

name: Rumble Enhancer
description: A Mod to tweak Rumble Behavior

name: BeatSinger
description: Beat Saber plugin for displaying floating lyrics while playing the game.

name: NotesLeftCounter
description: Adds a counter of how many notes are left in the song in game, can be toggled in Gameplay modifiers panel when selecting songs

name: MusicEscape
description: Tool for modders to allow Pausing/Restarting/Quitting a song with keyboard controls. 'Esc' to exit song, 'Left Shift + Esc' to restart, 'F2' to pause.

name: Hidden Blocks
description: Based off the popular HD mod for osu, HiddenBlocks makes any notes/bombs disappear when they come within range of your player.

name: Music Video Player
description: Lets you download and have a video play in sync with the music during a beat saber level (i.e. the songs music video, a dance video of for the song)

name: CustomWalls
description: A plugin for custom walls in Beat Saber

name: Custom Walls
description: A plugin for custom walls in Beat Saber

name: Bloom Mod
description:
Allows you to adjust the amount of bloom in game.
Originally Created by Ibodan
*See the github for config info*

name: Survey
description: We need your help. Fill out an important survey and get free sabers!

name: Alternative Play
description: DarthMaul, Spear, ReverseSaber, OneColor and many more gameplay options. Mix and match to discover new styles of play!

name: SongPlayHistory
description: A score tracker with simple in-game UI.

name: HonkSaber
description: honk

name: SongChartVisualizer
description: Displays an in-game chart with song difficulty information!

name: ImageCoverExpander
description: Expands the artwork cover of a song! Click "Mod Info" for images!

name: BailOutMode
description: Allows you to continue playing songs without posting a score if you fail, but allows you to post scores if you don't.

name: PlaylistLoaderLite
description: This plugin uses the official Playlist UI and loads custom playlist files in Beat Saber.

name: Yeet Debris
description: Returns the 'Reduce Debris' option to it's previous behavior of no longer spawning debris at all when enabled.

name: CustomJSONData
description: Lets mappers include arbitrary data in beatmaps, and lets modders access that data. Why did I make this? Good question.

name: RumbleMod
description: Modify the rumble parameters on hitting a note, saber, wall and ui.

name: SmoothCameraUnlimiter
description: Unlimits the Smooth Camera settings and enables the built-in third-person camera!

name: Chroma
description: Chromaâ„¢ boasts the most power in color customization you've ever seen, allowing mappers to customize blocks, lights, sabers, and barriers into not just one but multiple colors!

name: Noodle Extensions
description: A spiritual successor to Mapping Extensions, this allows mappers to precisely control aspects of map elements. Does not allow you to play Mapping Extensions maps!

name: NoodleExtensions
description: This mod lets you see cool things that mappers have put in their maps. Report all issues to Reaxt.

name: TrickSaber
description: A mod for performing tricks like spinning and throwing your sabers

name: LevelTweaks
description: Set custom note offset and note jump speed for levels and save them into profiles.

name: LagKiller
description: A rewritten "TheTrashMan" that takes into account Unity-specific incremental GC mode. It manually triggers incremental GC with the specified budget, + tracks frame drop/lag statistics.

name: Claws
description: Play Beat Saber like wolverine - 70% shorter hitboxes means you have to work /hard/. Reduces strain on your wrists significantly! Enable in song select or the multiplayer lobby.

name: ScorePercentage
description: Adds score percentage, percentage difference and score difference to results screen and score percentage to song info.

name: CustomMenuPointers
description: Use a custom pointer or saber in the menu and the pause menu!

name: AutoPauseStealth
description: Automatically and stealthily pause your game at the start of every song waiting for potential lag spikes to end.

name: BeatFollower
description: Share song plays, maps and recommendations with your stream. Twitch extension and public profile available at https://www.beatfollower.com . Make sure to login to create your profile!

name: FastFail
description: Shortens the "Level Failed" animation by ~2 seconds. Optionally lets you skip the animation via button press instead of automatically.

name: SongInfoViewer
description: Allows you to easily look at the BeatSaver song data of the currently selected song.

name: SiraUtil
description: A powerful utility mod which expands the capabilities and provides more tools to Beat Saber modders.

name: SnapTurn
description: A plugin for rotating the player using controller inputs.

name: Saber Factory
description: Customizable custom saber mod

name: CampaignObjectiveParticleDisabler
description: Removes the distracting particles that show up when you meet the requirements of an objective during a campaign mission.

name: ChatCore
description: ChatCore is a .NET Standard library that allows for developers to implement rich chat experiences across several chat services with ease.

name: DynamicOpenVR
description: Collection of Unity scripts that allow dynamic creation of OpenVR actions at runtime.

name: DiscordIntegration
description: Allows Beat Saber to display current beatmap information on your Discord profile. Comes with multiple customization options and support for many languages.

name: DiscordGameSDK
description: Discord's game SDK

name: BS_PP_BOOSTER
description: This plugin will allow you to generate ranked playlist according to your level or choosen settings, it's fully integrated in the game and will automaticly download songs & generate playlist.

name: Technicolor
description: Rainbow? To heck with rainbows! Technicolor is where it's at! Technicolor lets you add rainbow colors to your lights, notes, walls, sabers, and even bombs.

name: BetterMenu
description: Rearranges the main menu buttons into a more familiar grid layout

name: SpeedyPractice
description: Lets you configure the minimum and maximum practice mode speed multiplier. By default the maximum is increased to 300%.

name: Maximize SFX
description: A plugin for turn cut note and miss SFX Volume to maximize in Beat Saber. No config UI.

name: SiraLocalizer
description: Adds community translations to the game. Currently supports Chinese (Simplified), French, German, Italian, Korean, Portuguese (Brazilian), and Russian.

name: ServerBrowser
description: Adds a Server Browser to the Online menu, making it easy to share and join multiplayer games.

name: NoMissText
description: Simple mod that hides the flying text when a note is missed so you can hide how bad you really are.

name: DiscordCore
description: A plugin for Discord integration in Beat Saber

name: BeatSaberPresence
description: Discord Rich Presence for Beat Saber

name: DiColors
description: Allows you to change the colors various in the menu including the menu lights and menu sign!

name: DataPuller
description: Gathers data about the current map you are playing to then be sent out over a websocket for other software to use, e.g. A web overlay like BSDP-Overlay. This mod works with multi PC setups!

name: websocket-sharp
description: A C# implementation of the WebSocket protocol client and server

name: DebrisTweaks
description: Allows for full customization of various note debris parameters, including scale, lifetime and velocity.

name: BeatPresence
description: Discord Rich Presence for Beat Saber, because all the other solutions suck. Displays your active song, gamemode, difficulty, modifiers, and map type.

name: StreamMarkers
description:
This is a mod that automatically adds a Stream Marker while streaming on Twich.
The marker of the played song will be displayed in the Video Producer of Twich, and you will be able to seek to the star

name: MultiplayerExtensions
description: Expands the functionality of Beat Saber Multiplayer. Adds custom song support and a variety of other features.

name: PerformanceMeter
description: Shows a graph of your energy bar, percentage level, or cut value throughout a map on the end screen.

name: MultiplayerNameChanger
description: Simply change your name in Beat Saber Multiplayer.

name: No360HUD
description: Disables 360 HUD for maps that have no valid rotation events.

name: BeatTogether
description: A multiplayer private server for the modding community. Supports crossplay between PC and Quest. Requires MultiplayerExtensions for custom song support.

name: Cinema
description: Add music videos to the background of your maps

name: NoHealthAndSafety
description: A plugin to skip the health and safety warning at the beginning of the game. It works by automatically pressing the "Continue" button after a short delay.

name: BeatSaberPlaylistsLib
description: A library for reading and writing Beat Saber playlists. Does not do anything by itself.

name: CustomKeyEvent
description: For Custom Events To Trigger Avatar Animations https://github.com/PureDark/BSCustomKeyEvents

name: Custom Key Events
description: For Custom Events To Trigger Avatar Animations https://github.com/PureDark/BSCustomKeyEvents

name: LastFmScrobbler
description: This plugin allows you to submit tracks you play in game to last.fm

name: InstaFailAccuracy
description: Makes you fail if you're under a specific accuracy!

name: DiTails
description: View extra details about a map by clicking the cover image!

name: DiSounds
description: Customize your sounds! Change the menu music, add intro and outro sounds, custom songs for failing a level or getting a high score, and custom click sounds!

name: BeatSaviorData
description: BeatSaviorData is a Beat Saber plugin that collects and shows a lot of data about your plays, such as per-hand accuracy, speed, distance travelled, overswing percentages, ...

name: SpectroSaber
description: SpectroSaber is a mod that adds visualizers onto your sabers! The look of the visualizers can be customized through the mod's settings and is perfect for streaming/recordings or just looking cool.

name: MultiplayerColors
description: Shows the color scheme of other players in multiplayer. For players that also have the mod installed you will see their selected color scheme, otherwise a random color scheme will be generated.

name: SearchByMapperName
description: Super simple mod that makes the base game map search function also search the level author (mapper) field

name: NoBoom
description: A Simple mod that disables the particle effect when hitting a bomb. Can be toggled through the modifiers menu

name: 360fyer
description: Play any map in 360 or 90 degree mode!

name: CustomKeyEvents
description: This plugin allows you to set event triggers to controller actions. You will need CustomKeyEvents.dll  in your plugins folder in order to see animation on your avatar and see them in game.

name: Cover Color Saber
description: Takes the colors from the song cover and makes a usable color scheme.

name: PlaylistManager
description: Playlist loading and organization mod for Beat Saber. Click "Mod Info" for a guide on how to use the mod.

name: Camera2
description: Adds a lot of options / tools for creating more advanced desktop viewing experiences with multiple camera angles and much more. See the Github link for more details

name: FFmpeg
description: FFmpeg is the leading multimedia framework, able to decode, encode, transcode, mux, demux, stream, filter and play pretty much anything that humans and machines have created.

name: youtube-dl
description: youtube-dl is a command-line program to download videos from YouTube.com and a few more sites.

name: NoBuzz
description: Removes the Beat Saber logo buzzing sound.

name: DiBris
description: Customize your debris with a variety of settings!

name: ExtendedColorSchemes
description: Adds additional custom slots to color schemes.

name: protobuf-net
description: Provides simple access to fast and efficient "Protocol Buffers" serialization from .NET applications

name: FasterScroll
description: Increase SongList scrolling's speed to your own taste, change its acceleration curve, tweak its rumble effects

name: CAS Sharpening ReShade for Beat Saber
description: AMD's new Contrast Adaptive Sharpening tech makes Beat Saber look super sharp and clear even on older headsets. (also works on NVIDIA GPUs) This preset has been specifically tailored for Beat Saber

name: Custom Menu Buttons
description: Allows you to customize your menu buttons in the main menu

name: ModelDownloader
description: A PC Beat Saber mod that allows you to download Sabers, Notes, Platforms, and Avatars directly from ModelSaber, all from a convenient window within your game.

name: Custom Energy Bars
description: Adds support for custom energy bars to the game.  Click "Mod Info" to learn how to make your own!

name: ImageFactory
description: Place images and gifs in your game and customize how they appear!

name: Tweaks55
description: A collection of various tweaks which by themselves are too simple for their own designated mods

name: SongDetailsCache
description: A library which provides access to the ScoreSaber and BeatSaver information of all Songs using a cached local database

name: PinkCute
description: Pink Cute! That's all there is to it

name: MorePlaylists
description: Download playlists from BeatSaver, BeastSaber, Hitbloq and AccSaber ingame!

name: EnvironmentMinifier
description: Minifies the environment chroma style

name: FizzyUtils
description: Some utilities for mods (mostly FizzyApple12's) to use. Doesn't do anything user facing in game.

name: JDFixer
description: Change Jump Distance and Reaction Time, including automation through preferences and thresholds

name: ControllerTweaks
description: Remap Oculus Controllers, Enable Controller Swap or change Controller Offsets from Practice!

name: ScoreRequirement
description: This mod allows you to disable ScoreSaber submission entirely with 5 parameters - All independently toggleable! If you want more info, head on over to the GitHub repository - Click mod info!

name: _Heck
description: Library for Aeroluna's mods.

name: UITweaks
description: Add some color to your in-game HUD!

name: Burnout
description: A Beat Saber plugin for customizing saber burn marks.

name: CustomBanners
description: Display images as banners or cycle through them automatically

name: Nya
description: Beat Saber mod for displaying nya-tastic images from various anime themed web APIs

name: TakeMeToResults
description: A simple mod that adds a button which takes you to the results screen.

name: SongPlayHistoryContinued
description: A local score tracker with simple in-game UI. Created by peperoro.

name: I Forgor
description: Displays the direction of the last notes you hit and saber angles in the pause menu.

name: BetterSongSearch
description: Search and download songs with a lot of filtering and sorting options and without frustration! Also allows you to create Playlists!

name: BetterSongList
description: Adds various improvements to the Basegame song list like Filters, a persisted state and much more

name: BadCutType
description: Replace "X" bad cut effect with custom text for each bad cut type.

name: SearchFixes
description: An improved search algorithm for Beat Saber.

name: HitSoundChanger
description: Allows you to change the sounds used for cutting notes and bad hits.

name: yt-dlp
description: A youtube-dl fork with additional features and fixes

name: BetterStaticLights
description: Allows you to customize your lights when using Static Lights! You get to pick and choose which ones you want on and which environment color they use.

name: PlayFirst(SubmitLater)
description: Decide score submission in pause menu and the end of a map, prevent submission of failed NF scores, based on song duration, or disable all scores.

name: Link
description: Adds a !link command to your stream which posts the BeatSaver link to the actively played map in your chat.

name: LookupID
description: A single method written in C++ for Chroma because regex in mono is unbelievably slow. Also beatmods sucks.

name: EasyOffset
description: Intuitive controller offset adjustment tool. Includes swing benchmark for config and grip analysis

name: SliceDetails
description: A tool that shows your average cut angle and offset per note position/angle to help perfect your accuracy.

name: Small Menu
description: Makes the main menu smaller & closer, just like it was in Beat Saber 1.13.0.

name: FontChanger
description: Simple mod, that allows you to change HUD font.

name: SearchByCharacters
description:
A different map searching approach for beat saber.

-Convert special characters to allow maps containing them to be researched.
-Allow to search incomplete Map Name or Artist.
-And more (see Github).

name: Hitbloq
description: A competitive service that allows you to compete on leaderboards from a variety of user-created map pools.

name: OcuFix
description: Automatically disable ASW and change services/runtime priority

name: LeaderboardCore
description: A utility for custom leaderboards that rely on ScoreSaber.

name: SmoothCamPlus
description: Extra options to configure Beat Saber's Smooth Camera even more, no Cam2 required.

name: SoundReplacer
description: Allows you to change different in-game sounds like hit sounds, menu music, click sounds, etc.

name: FCPercentage
description: Show your accuracy as a percentage without drops from misses or a lowered combo multiplier. Optional Counters+ custom counter available.

name: Arcgap
description: Fixes game softlock / crash on 1.20.0 & 1.21.0

name: DrinkWater
description: Beat Saber mod to remind you of the importance of hydration

name: MenuSaberColors
description: Allows your menu pointers to be the same colors as your in-game sabers.

name: PiFix
description: A simple fix needed to play beatsaber on a Pimax headset without having double vision. Or needing Parallel Projections. PiFix corrects the double vision error shown on Pimax and Xtal headsets in game

name: BeatSaverUpdater
description: Alerts you of updates to beatmaps on BeatSaver and updates them to the latest version.

name: Greetings
description: Beat Saber mod for playing a video on the game's start up

name: bHaptics
description: A library to interface with the bHaptics Player and play back haptic feedback patterns in the supported gear.

name: bHapticsFunctional
description: This mod adds haptic feedback in the bhaptics gear for slicing or missing blocks, exploding bombs, and hitting obstacles.

name: bHapticsMusical
